templates.question: Which district has the most inventory of BRANDPARAMATER on hand in units?
templates.desc: The district with the most UNITS of BRANDPARAMATER in DISTRICT.
templates.query: WITH Find_BrandName AS (     SELECT TOP 1             BRAND_LABEL AS FullBrandName     FROM   ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND     WHERE  BRAND_DESC LIKE '%BRANDPARAMATER%' ),Top_OnHand AS (     SELECT TOP 1             SUM(REVENUE_UNITS_TY) AS inventory_units          , L.DISTRICT_DESC       AS DISTRICT_DESC     FROM   ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND    LB ON SA.BRAND_CD    = LB.BRAND_CD        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD       JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_DISTRICT L  ON LL.DISTRICT_CD = L.DISTRICT_CD      WHERE  LB.BRAND_DESC                   LIKE '%BRANDPARAMATER%'     GROUP BY L.DISTRICT_DESC     ORDER BY inventory_units DESC )  SELECT  CONCAT('The STATE/DISTRICT with the most on-hand '             , (SELECT MAX(FullBrandName) FROM Find_BrandName)             , ' is the '             , REGEXP_SUBSTR(DISTRICT_DESC, '[a-zA-Z]+')              , ' district with '             , INVENTORY_UNITS             , ' units.'         ) AS RESULTS FROM Top_OnHand

templates.question: Which state has the most inventory of BRANDPARAMATER on hand in units?
templates.desc: The state with the most UNITS of BRANDPARAMATER in STATE.
templates.query: WITH Find_BrandName AS (     SELECT TOP 1             BRAND_LABEL AS FullBrandName     FROM   ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND     WHERE  BRAND_DESC LIKE '%BRANDPARAMATER%' ),Top_OnHand AS (     SELECT TOP 1             SUM(REVENUE_UNITS_TY) AS inventory_units          , L.DISTRICT_DESC       AS DISTRICT_DESC     FROM   ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND    LB ON SA.BRAND_CD    = LB.BRAND_CD        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD       JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_DISTRICT L  ON LL.DISTRICT_CD = L.DISTRICT_CD      WHERE  LB.BRAND_DESC                   LIKE '%BRANDPARAMATER%'     GROUP BY L.DISTRICT_DESC     ORDER BY inventory_units DESC )  SELECT  CONCAT('The STATE/DISTRICT with the most on-hand '             , (SELECT MAX(FullBrandName) FROM Find_BrandName)             , ' is the '             , REGEXP_SUBSTR(DISTRICT_DESC, '[a-zA-Z]+')              , ' district with '             , INVENTORY_UNITS             , ' units.'         ) AS RESULTS FROM Top_OnHand

templates.question: Which STATE has the most inventory of BRAND on hand in dollars?
templates.desc: The STATE with the most DOLLARS of BRAND in STATE.
templates.query: WITH Find_BrandName AS (     SELECT TOP 1             BRAND_LABEL AS FullBrandName     FROM   ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND     WHERE  BRAND_DESC LIKE  '%BRANDPARAMATER%' ),Top_OnHand AS (     SELECT TOP 1             SUM(INVENTORY_DOLLARS_TY) AS REVENUE_DOLLARS          , L.DISTRICT_DESC         AS DISTRICT_DESC     FROM   ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND    LB ON SA.BRAND_CD    = LB.BRAND_CD        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD       JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_DISTRICT L  ON LL.DISTRICT_CD = L.DISTRICT_CD      WHERE  LB.BRAND_DESC                   LIKE  '%BRANDPARAMATER%'     GROUP BY DISTRICT_DESC     ORDER BY REVENUE_DOLLARS DESC )  SELECT  CONCAT('The STATE/DISTRICT with the most on-hand '             , (SELECT MAX(FullBrandName) FROM Find_BrandName)             , ' is the "'             , DISTRICT_DESC             , '" district with $'             , LTRIM(TO_VARCHAR(IFNULL(REVENUE_DOLLARS,0), '999,999,999,990'))             , ' worth of inventory.'          ) AS RESULTS FROM Top_OnHand

templates.question: Which DISTRICT has the most inventory of BRAND on hand in dollars?
templates.desc: The DISTRICT with the most DOLLARS of BRAND in DISTRICT.
templates.query: WITH Find_BrandName AS (     SELECT TOP 1             BRAND_LABEL AS FullBrandName     FROM   ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND     WHERE  BRAND_DESC LIKE  '%BRANDPARAMATER%' ),Top_OnHand AS (     SELECT TOP 1             SUM(INVENTORY_DOLLARS_TY) AS REVENUE_DOLLARS          , L.DISTRICT_DESC         AS DISTRICT_DESC     FROM   ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND    LB ON SA.BRAND_CD    = LB.BRAND_CD        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD       JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_DISTRICT L  ON LL.DISTRICT_CD = L.DISTRICT_CD      WHERE  LB.BRAND_DESC                   LIKE  '%BRANDPARAMATER%'     GROUP BY DISTRICT_DESC     ORDER BY REVENUE_DOLLARS DESC )  SELECT  CONCAT('The STATE/DISTRICT with the most on-hand '             , (SELECT MAX(FullBrandName) FROM Find_BrandName)             , ' is the "'             , DISTRICT_DESC             , '" district with $'             , LTRIM(TO_VARCHAR(IFNULL(REVENUE_DOLLARS,0), '999,999,999,990'))             , ' worth of inventory.'          ) AS RESULTS FROM Top_OnHand

templates.question: Which CITY has the most UNITS of BRAND on hand?
templates.desc: The CITY with the most UNITS of BRAND.
templates.query: WITH Find_BrandName AS (     SELECT TOP 1             BRAND_LABEL AS FullBrandName     FROM   ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND     WHERE  BRAND_DESC LIKE '%BRANDPARAMATER%' ),Top_OnHand AS (     SELECT TOP 1             SUM(INVENTORY_UNITS_TY) AS INVENTORY_UNITS_TY          , LL.LOCATION_DESC         AS LOCATION_DESC     FROM   ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND    LB ON SA.BRAND_CD    = LB.BRAND_CD        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD     WHERE  LB.BRAND_DESC                   LIKE '%BRANDPARAMATER%'     GROUP BY LOCATION_DESC     ORDER BY INVENTORY_UNITS_TY DESC )  SELECT  CONCAT('The STORE/LOCATION/CITY with the most on-hand '             , (SELECT MAX(FullBrandName) FROM Find_BrandName)             , ' is the "'             , LOCATION_DESC             , '" location with '             , FLOOR(INVENTORY_UNITS_TY)             , ' units.'          ) AS RESULTS FROM Top_OnHand

templates.desc: The LOCATION with the most UNITS of BRAND.
templates.query: WITH Find_BrandName AS (     SELECT TOP 1             BRAND_LABEL AS FullBrandName     FROM   ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND     WHERE  BRAND_DESC LIKE '%BRANDPARAMATER%' ),Top_OnHand AS (     SELECT TOP 1             SUM(INVENTORY_UNITS_TY) AS INVENTORY_UNITS_TY          , LL.LOCATION_DESC         AS LOCATION_DESC     FROM   ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_BRAND    LB ON SA.BRAND_CD    = LB.BRAND_CD        JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD     WHERE  LB.BRAND_DESC                   LIKE '%BRANDPARAMATER%'     GROUP BY LOCATION_DESC     ORDER BY INVENTORY_UNITS_TY DESC )  SELECT  CONCAT('The STORE/LOCATION/CITY with the most on-hand '             , (SELECT MAX(FullBrandName) FROM Find_BrandName)             , ' is the "'             , LOCATION_DESC             , '" location with '             , FLOOR(INVENTORY_UNITS_TY)             , ' units.'          ) AS RESULTS FROM Top_OnHand

templates.desc: The STORE with the most UNITS of BRAND.
